title: Task Manager Web App
subtitle: React + TypeScript calendar UI
description: A calendar-based task management web application that allows users to create, edit, schedule, and complete tasks using intuitive weekly and monthly calendar views.
howBuilt: Designed the UI using reusable React components such as panels, cards, and buttons.
Implemented weekly and monthly calendar views using scrollable time grids.
Connected tasks to time blocks and stored data locally for persistence.
Structured the app around clean routing and a shared layout.
challenges: Managing complex UI state for task editing and scheduling.
Ensuring smooth scrolling and rendering performance in the calendar views.
Handling task editing without resetting form state prematurely.

title: 3D Visualizer
subtitle: C# backend + Three.js renderer
description: An interactive 3D visualization tool that allows users to create, manipulate, and explore 3D objects in real time.
howBuilt: Built the backend logic in C# to manage object data and transformations.
Integrated a Three.js renderer for real-time 3D visualisation.
Implemented camera controls, object selection, and transformation tools.
Designed a modular architecture for future expansion.
challenges: Synchronising backend object state with the 3D renderer.
Optimising rendering performance for complex scenes.
Designing intuitive camera and object controls.

title: TensorFlow ML
subtitle: Training + evaluation experiments
description: A collection of machine learning experiments built using TensorFlow, focusing on training, evaluating, and optimising neural network models for classification tasks.
howBuilt: Built training pipelines using TensorFlow and Keras.
Implemented data preprocessing and augmentation workflows.
Evaluated models using validation metrics and visualisations.
Experimented with different architectures and hyperparameters.
challenges: Managing long training times and large model sizes.

title: Project Manager (WPF)
subtitle: C#/.NET desktop productivity
description: A desktop-based project management application built using WPF that allows users to manage projects, track progress, and visualise timelines.
howBuilt: Designed the UI using WPF with MVVM architecture.
Implemented a local SQLite database for project storage.
Built timeline and task tracking views.
Used event-driven patterns for responsive UI updates.
challenges: Synchronising UI updates with database changes.
